channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Seven large laughing gas canisters, 1st February
item.description:
I found seven large laughing gas canisters strewn around. I have placed them altogether as specified above. Please can they be disposed of appropriately.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blackbrook Lane, Southborough, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Debris in road, 1st February
item.description:
Following car crash the vehicle was removed but debris has been left at the scene.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1A, Wellington Avenue, Blackfen, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipped mattress, 1st February
item.description:
A mattress has been dumped on the corner of Woolwich Rd and Halstow Rd. It is blocking the pavement causing problems for people with mobility issues and prams. There is also a bicycle which has been attached to the pole for months without moving.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Woolwich Road, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 10inch pothole by bus stop, 1st February
item.description:
Difficult to avoid

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gravel Hill, Bexley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbis dumped again & RATS, 1st February
item.description:
Constant bags & bags of rubbish left outside the pharmacy & chicken shop! Unable to get past with a buggy or wheelchair due to amount of rubbish piled up & ramp outside the pharmacy blocking the way. Have seen a blind person fall & hurt them self. People with buggy’s having to use the cycle lane to pass. The smell is disgusting & I have seen rats!!! This problem is out of hand now & need permanently fixing!!
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Woolwich Road, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping on institute place, 1st February
item.description:
Continuous fly tipping on institute place despite ‘no fly tipping’ signs. A lot of good they’re doing, so I’ll keep reporting it time and time again

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Institute Place, Hackney, London

item.title: Street light not working, 1st February
item.description:
The street light highlighted does not work. This is both a safety and security issue. Can it please be repaired as soon as possible. Thank you

item.title: Graffiti sprayed on white section of wall at 230-234 Brixton road SW9 6AH. The graffiti is next to a gym and the wording spells Alice in green spray paint. Please can it be painted over., 1st February
item.description:
I like to report graffiti sprayed at 230-234 Brixton road SW9. The graffiti is on a white section of wall next to a gym the wording spells 'Alice'. Please can it be painted over. The same culprit has sprayed graffiti all along the entire main road which is very visible. The graffiti has been up for over a month.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 206a, Brixton Road, Oval, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti sprayed on lower part of wall at 272 Robstart Street Brixton Sw9., 1st February
item.description:
I like to report graffiti sprayed on a wall at 272 Robstart Street Brixton SW9. The graffiti is on a wall opposite a small coffee shop. There is a fair amount of it on the wall. Please can it be jet-sprayed off and other sections painted over. The graffiti has been there for approximately over a month.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 276, Brixton Road, Brixton, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish accumulation, 1st February
item.description:
Litter - empty beer cans etc. This area has a constant litter problem, especially at weekends. It is annoying that this area is not included in the regular street cleaning that occurs along the main roads. This a road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Drive, Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Excessive Noise Due To New Traffic System, 1st February
item.description:
Car horn noise became excessive in recent weeks; day and through night. Always been lively here. Now a new problem. Frustrated drivers blocked from turning left to Graham Road. Front car doesn't see green light (bad angle?) or waits to go straight (lane?).
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mare Street, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain near bus stop outside 191-193 Kilburn Lane, 1st February
item.description:
The drain has been constantly blocked for months. Every time it rains, a massive puddle forms and people at the bus stop are constantly getting wet from vehicles which need to move closer the kerb when traffic is passing on the other side of the wall. The constant puddle has started to cause the tarmac to crumble and potholes to appear. Please can the drain be cleared. Thank you.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kilburn Lane, North Kensington, London
Report on FixMyStreet
